name: ImageData
description: The ImageData interface represents the underlying pixel data of an area of a canvas element. It is created using the ImageData() constructor or creator methods on the CanvasRenderingContext2D object associated with a canvas: createImageData() and getImageData(). It can also be used to set a part of the canvas by using putImageData().

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'ImageData' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
